# dismiss(_:)

**Instance Method**

Dismisses the dashboard.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBAction @MainActor func dismiss(_ sender: Any)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The object that dismisses the dashboard.

## Presenting and Dismissing the Dialog

- **present(_:)**: Presents the dashboard in the window.

items.description: Presents the dashboard in the window.
items.name: present(_:)

title: dismiss(_:)
